SEARCH
Package org.hms.services.appointment

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
org.hms.services.AbstractService<IAppointmentDataInterface>
org.hms.services.appointment.AppointmentService
public class AppointmentService extends AbstractService<IAppointmentDataInterface>
AppointmentService provides functionalities to manage medical appointments. This includes scheduling, rescheduling, and canceling appointments. It also provides methods for viewing and updating appointment details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    AppointmentService(IAppointmentDataInterface dataInterface)
    Constructs an AppointmentService instance with the provided data interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentService

      public AppointmentService(IAppointmentDataInterface dataInterface)
      Constructs an AppointmentService instance with the provided data interface. Initializes the appointment service by reading existing appointments and their outcomes from CSV storage.
      Parameters:
      dataInterface - an instance of IAppointmentDataInterface for accessing appointment-related data

  • Method Details

    • displayOneAppointment

      public void displayOneAppointment(AppointmentInformation appointment)
      Displays the details of a single appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - An object containing the information of the appointment to be displayed.

    • getAppointmentSchedule

      public AppointmentSchedule getAppointmentSchedule(String date)
      Retrieves the appointment schedule for a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the appointment schedule is requested.
      Returns:
      The appointment schedule for the specified date.

    • getDoctorID

      public String getDoctorID(String patientID)
      Retrieves the doctor's unique identifier associated with a patient's appointment. The method searches through the list of appointments to find a matching patient ID with an appointment status of either PENDING or CONFIRMED.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier for the patient whose doctor's ID is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The doctor's unique identifier if a matching appointment with the patient ID is found and the appointment is PENDING or CONFIRMED; null if no such appointment is found.

    • getCurrentAppointmentStatus

      public AppointmentStatus getCurrentAppointmentStatus(String patientID)
      Gets the current appointment status for a patient identified by the given patientID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier for the patient whose appointment status is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The current status of the patient's appointment. If no appointment is found, returns null.

    • checkExistingAppointment

      public Boolean checkExistingAppointment(String patientID)
      Checks for an existing active appointment for a given patient.

      An appointment is considered active if its status is not COMPLETED or CANCELLED.

      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier for the patient.
      Returns:
      true if there are no active appointments for the specified patient, false if there is an active appointment.

    • getAppointmentDateTime

      public String[] getAppointmentDateTime(String patientID)
      Retrieves the date and time slot of the appointment for a given patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose appointment details are being requested
      Returns:
      an array of Strings where the first element is the appointment date in "yyyyMMdd" format and the second element is the appointment time slot in "HH:mm" format. Returns null if no matching appointment is found.

    • resumeDoctorSchedule

      public void resumeDoctorSchedule(String doctorID, String Date, String timeSlot)
      Resumes the doctor's schedule by setting a specific time slot to "available".
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier for the doctor.
      Date - The date for which the schedule needs to be resumed.
      timeSlot - The time slot that needs to be set to "available".

    • setAppointmentToCanceled

      public void setAppointmentToCanceled(String patientID)
      Sets the status of the first confirmed or pending appointment for the given patient ID to CANCELED. If no matching appointment is found, the method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient whose appointment is to be canceled

    • scheduleAppointment

      public boolean scheduleAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, String Date, String timeSlot, AppointmentSchedule schedule)
      Schedules an appointment for a patient with a specific doctor at a given date and time slot.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient for whom the appointment is being scheduled.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor with whom the appointment is being scheduled.
      Date - The date for which the appointment is scheduled.
      timeSlot - The specific time slot for the appointment.
      schedule - The current appointment schedule.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully scheduled, false otherwise.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, String date, String timeSlot)
      Reschedules an appointment for a patient with a specified doctor at a new date and time slot.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose appointment is being rescheduled.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor with whom the appointment is being rescheduled.
      date - The new date for the rescheduled appointment in YYYYMMDD format.
      timeSlot - The new time slot for the rescheduled appointment in HH:mm format.

    • viewAppointmentStatus

      public void viewAppointmentStatus(String patientID)
      Displays the appointment status for a specified patient ID. If appointments are found for the given patient ID, it displays each appointment's details. If no appointments are found, it notifies that no appointments were found for the provided patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient whose appointment status needs to be viewed.

    • viewUpcomingAppointments

      public void viewUpcomingAppointments(String patientID)
      Displays the details of the upcoming appointments for the specified patient. An appointment is considered upcoming if its status is either PENDING or CONFIRMED.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique identifier of the patient whose upcoming appointments are to be viewed.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(String timeSlotString, int appointmentID, String patientID, String doctorID)
      Adds a new appointment to the system. This method takes in the details of the appointment, including the time slot, appointment ID, patient ID, and doctor ID, and creates an appointment record with a pending status. The appointment record is then saved to persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      timeSlotString - the time slot for the appointment in the format "yyyyMMdd HH:mm-HH:mm"
      appointmentID - the unique identifier for the appointment
      patientID - the unique identifier for the patient
      doctorID - the unique identifier for the doctor

    • displayMatrix

      public void displayMatrix(String date)
      Displays the appointment matrix for a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the appointment matrix is to be displayed.

    • displaySchedule

      public void displaySchedule(String date)
      Displays the appointment schedule for a given date, listing available time slots and corresponding staff members.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the appointment schedule is to be displayed, in yyyy-MM-dd format.

    • displayAppointmentOutcomesByPatient

      public void displayAppointmentOutcomesByPatient(String patientID)
      Displays the appointment outcomes for a given patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique identifier of the patient whose appointment outcomes are to be displayed

    • getPatienIDbyAppointmentID

      public String getPatienIDbyAppointmentID(String appointmentID)
      Retrieves the patient ID associated with a given appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the unique identifier for the appointment
      Returns:
      the patient ID associated with the appointment, or null if no matching appointment is found

    • viewRequest

      public boolean viewRequest(String doctorID)
      Displays all pending appointment requests for a given doctor based on their ID. If no pending requests are found, it prints a message to the console.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the unique identifier of the doctor whose pending appointment requests are to be viewed
      Returns:
      true if there are pending appointments for the specified doctor, false otherwise

    • manageAppointmentRequests

      public void manageAppointmentRequests(int appointmentID, String doctorID)
      Manages appointment requests by allowing a doctor to update the status of a pending appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique identifier of the appointment to be managed.
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor handling the appointment request.

    • viewDoctorSchedule

      public void viewDoctorSchedule(String doctorID, String date)
      Displays the confirmed appointments for a specific doctor on a given date. If no confirmed appointments are found, a message will be printed indicating so.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor whose schedule is to be viewed.
      date - The specific date for which the doctor's confirmed appointments are to be viewed.

    • setDoctorSchedule

      public void setDoctorSchedule(String doctorID, String Date, String timeSlot)
      Sets the schedule for a doctor by making a specific time slot available.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor whose schedule is being set.
      Date - The date for which the schedule is being set.
      timeSlot - The specific time slot that is being set as available.

    • cancelDoctorSchedule

      public void cancelDoctorSchedule(String doctorID, String Date, String timeSlot)
      Cancels the schedule of a doctor for a specific time slot on a given date.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - Identifier of the doctor whose schedule is to be canceled.
      Date - The date for which the doctor's schedule is to be canceled.
      timeSlot - The specific time slot that needs to be canceled.

    • viewDoctorDailySchedule

      public boolean viewDoctorDailySchedule(String doctorID, String date)
      Displays the daily schedule of a specific doctor for a given date.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the unique identifier of the doctor
      date - the specific date for which the schedule is to be viewed
      Returns:
      true if the doctor's schedule for the given date is found and displayed successfully, false otherwise

    • keyInOutcome

      public AppointmentOutcome keyInOutcome(String appointmentID, String patientID, String typeOfAppointment, String consultationNotes, ArrayList<DrugDispenseRequest> prescribedMedication)
      Records the outcome of an appointment by creating an AppointmentOutcome object.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment
      patientID - the ID of the patient
      typeOfAppointment - the type of the appointment
      consultationNotes - notes from the consultation during the appointment
      prescribedMedication - a list of prescribed medications during the appointment
      Returns:
      the created AppointmentOutcome object

    • displayAppointmentsForDoctor

      public void displayAppointmentsForDoctor(String date, String doctorID)
      Displays the list of confirmed appointments for a specific doctor on a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the specified date in the format yyyyMMdd to filter appointments.
      doctorID - the unique identifier of the doctor whose appointments are to be displayed.

    • displayAllAppointmentsForDoctor

      public boolean displayAllAppointmentsForDoctor(String doctorID)
      Displays all confirmed appointments for a given doctor based on their doctor ID. If no confirmed appointments are found, it will print a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor for whom the confirmed appointments are to be displayed.
      Returns:
      true if at least one confirmed appointment is found for the given doctor ID, false otherwise.

    • addAppointmentOutcome

      public void addAppointmentOutcome(AppointmentOutcome outcome)
      Adds a new appointment outcome to the list of appointment outcomes.
      Parameters:
      outcome - The appointment outcome to add.

    • displayAllAppointments

      public void displayAllAppointments()
      Displays all appointments available in the system. This method iterates over the list of appointments and calls the displayOneAppointment method to output the details of each appointment. This functionality is intended for administrative users.

    • createNewAppointmentOutcome

      public AppointmentOutcome createNewAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentID, String patientID, String typeOfAppointment, String consultationNotes, ArrayList<DrugDispenseRequest> prescribedMedication)
      Creates a new appointment outcome and records it.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment.
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      typeOfAppointment - The type of the appointment (e.g., consultation, follow-up).
      consultationNotes - Notes from the consultation.
      prescribedMedication - List of medications prescribed during the appointment.
      Returns:
      The newly created AppointmentOutcome object.

    • createNewArrayOfDrugDispenseRequest

      public ArrayList<DrugDispenseRequest> createNewArrayOfDrugDispenseRequest()
      Creates a new ArrayList of DrugDispenseRequest objects.
      Returns:
      A new ArrayList containing DrugDispenseRequest objects.

    • addDrugDispenseRequest

      public void addDrugDispenseRequest(ArrayList<DrugDispenseRequest> list, String drugName, int addQuantity)
      Adds a new drug dispense request to the given list of requests.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of DrugDispenseRequest objects to add the new request to.
      drugName - The name of the drug to be dispensed.
      addQuantity - The quantity of the drug to be dispensed.

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public boolean updatePrescriptionStatus(String appointmentID)
      Updates the status of the prescribed medications for a given appointment ID. If any medication is in pending status, it is updated to dispensed.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment for which the prescription status needs to be updated
      Returns:
      true if at least one medication status was updated, otherwise false

    • updateAppointmentOutcometoCSV

      public boolean updateAppointmentOutcometoCSV()
      Updates all appointment outcomes by writing them into a CSV file.
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether the operation was successful

    • displayPendingPrescriptions

      public void displayPendingPrescriptions()
      Displays the list of pending prescriptions for all appointment outcomes. The method iterates over the stored appointment outcomes and checks each prescribed medication to determine if any drugs are pending. If there are pending drugs, their details are printed to the console. Otherwise, it indicates that there are no pending drugs for the appointment.

    • getPatientIDsWithPendingDrugRequest

      public List<String> getPatientIDsWithPendingDrugRequest()
      Returns a list of patient IDs that have pending drug requests.
      Returns:
      A list of patient IDs as strings that have pending drug requests.

    • getAppointmentOutcomesPendingPrescriptionByPatientID

      public List<AppointmentOutcome> getAppointmentOutcomesPendingPrescriptionByPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves a list of appointment outcomes that have a pending prescription for a given patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the ID of the patient for whom to retrieve appointment outcomes with pending prescriptions
      Returns:
      a list of AppointmentOutcome objects that have pending prescriptions for the specified patient

    • getDrugRequestsByPatientID

      public ArrayList<DrugDispenseRequest> getDrugRequestsByPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves a list of pending drug dispense requests for the specified patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique identifier of the patient whose drug requests are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing DrugDispenseRequest objects that are pending for the specified patient. If there are no pending requests, an empty list is returned with a console message indicating no pending requests for the given patient ID.

    • completeAnAppointment

      public boolean completeAnAppointment(String appointmentID, String doctorID)
      Updates the status of an appointment to COMPLETED if it is currently CONFIRMED.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique identifier of the appointment to be completed.
      doctorID - The identifier of the doctor associated with the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment status was successfully updated to COMPLETED, false otherwise.

    • addNewDoctorToSchedule

      public void addNewDoctorToSchedule(String doctorID, String date)
      Adds a new doctor to the appointment schedule for the specified date. This method updates the schedule by adding the doctor to the matrix and setting all their time slots to "available".
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The unique identifier of the doctor to be added to the schedule.
      date - The date of the schedule to which the doctor is to be added.

    • updateAllSchedulesWithNewDoctor

      public void updateAllSchedulesWithNewDoctor(String doctorID)
      Updates all scheduled appointments with a new doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the unique identifier of the new doctor to be added to all schedules.

    • checkExistingSchedule

      public boolean checkExistingSchedule(String date)
      Checks if a schedule exists for the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date in "yyyyMMdd" format for which the schedule existence needs to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the schedule exists for the given date, false otherwise.

    • createNewSchedule

      public void createNewSchedule(String date)
      Initializes a new schedule for the given date if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the schedule is to be created, formatted as YYYYMMDD.
